name: montanan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Montana: I'm pleased a Montanan has been picked for this important job. He hopes a wealthy Montanan will step forward to buy the fossils and donate them to an in-state museum.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is a third-generation Montanan who grew up in Black Eagle.Schools teach all Montanans about their state's 12 Indian tribes.Montanans were about evenly split on the issue of a tougher intoxication standard for driving a motor vehicle.

belonging or relating to the US state of Montana or its people: He grew up in the Montanan city of Great Falls. Many Montanan families are in a similar situation.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is executive director of the Montanan chapter of the American Civil Liberties Union.The Montanan capital, Helena, is recognizable because of its individual skyline view.Montanan same-sex households mushroomed by 932 percent.
